website_summaries.verdict: If it's time for a party, make sure the entire gang has a cold drink with this set of four colorful, cost-effective freezer mugs.
pros: Can store mugs in the freezer after washing out so they're ready to go when needed
Quickly cools down desired beverage, even if was at room temperature
cons: Some mugs have formed cracks after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping liquid super cold!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time I purchased these. My husband likes his sodas to get super cold and slushy and this does the trick. Keeps liquids super cold and eliminates the need for using ice cubes. Obviously this is a big plus for us since we now own 8 of them. Do NOT use in dishwasher and don't use for really hot liquids (warm liquids needing cooled down is perfectly fine).
customer_reviews.author: Potter

customer_reviews.title: Love these, but handles fall off
customer_reviews.text: I would rate these only 3 because they break so fast, but I really enjoyed them for the few months that they lasted, then I purchased a new set. I love them as frozen mugs, and even as just mugs for by the pool, or anywhere on a hot day. But the first one broke after a few months, and the next two before a year's time. The handles fall off. I ended up throwing them out, because I need that handle. There is still one left from the original four, but it's of course the orange, which is my least favorite color, and so not used much.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schjelderup

customer_reviews.title: Great 14oz (of usable space) mugs.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice mugs, they stay cold enough to freeze whatever you have in them even after an hour of use. The only reason I'm not giving them a 5 is that they say 16oz which is technically true if you fill them to the absolute top; what they have is actually 14oz of usable space. I'm glad I got them but this is the typical push the numbers as far as you can stuff. So if you want a mug that really keeps the drink cold you should like these, and chances are you're not as persnickety as I am. :) At least for your sake I hope you're not.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Foss

customer_reviews.title: Some are good and some are not, but I still love these MUGS!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several sets of these in the past. Some do crack at the inside bottom after only one or two uses. Others, I've had for years. I have no idea what makes one different than another, they're all handled exactly the same way. I just bought another set to add to the remaining ones of a previous set. I've tried several others on Amazon and these are still best for staying cold longer.
customer_reviews.author: OBX

customer_reviews.title: Glasses crack around handle
customer_reviews.text: Two glasses have cracked by the handle and now will gather water. I have hand washed all the glasses. After the first one broke, I made a point to tap the glasses to distribute the stuff inside the mugs evenly. The second glass had a crack the next time I took it out of the freezer. None of the glasses have had anything hot in them, nor been put in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: gdog max

customer_reviews.title: Drink became cold and slushy!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so i havent had these long enough to tell if they will last but as of now im impressed with how cold its keeping my drink. I poured some unrefrigerated mt. Dew in this cup a couple hours ago and it has only gotten colder and ended up getting slushy! I froze it upside down like the instructions said. I sure hope these last!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Hold Up!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the mugs I liked them a lot besides the fact I thought they were a bit heavy. They freeze well and keep my beverage cold for hours. I use them daily as I like my beverages very cold and don’t like fiddling around with ice cubes. After about six months of having the mugs the handle broke off the blue one. Last week the bottom fell off the red mug and the gell was oozing out everywhere. I’m now down to two mugs and afraid same thing will happen to them so I have discontinued use and will search out another brand. I don’t recommend these mugs if you plan on using them daily. .
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Lily’s Home Double Wall Gel Freezer Mug - Set of Four Mugs
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are wonderful for any drink you want to keep cold. I have been using similar mugs for years now and don’t like using anything else for my beverages. I would highly recommend these mugs to everyone. You sure won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Craft

customer_reviews.title: Nice frosty drinks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these in the past aswell, I love them. They do tend to break around the handles. Some handles will crack the cup, some will just crack the Handel. Hand wash only, and if taken care of, they seem to last pretty long. I’ve had some for years, others will break in a couple weeks, but for the price, I think they’re a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY GOOD FREEZER MUGS
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product. The mugs stay cold for a while. Worth the money for a set of 4. Not as good as the set of 2 I bought from another seller via Amazon in 2018. Those were no longer available at the time, so I purchased these from “Lily’s Home” via Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband for Christmas, but the entire family uses them. They wash in the dishwasher well without losing the gel inside. They make their contents VERY cold — icy sometimes even. I love the colors and they freeze quickly. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Payne

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. My term aged stepson went through a few of these before getting this set. He is still on the first mug after a few months off constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ice cups
customer_reviews.text: we purchased these for our daughter but found they break quite easily at the handle when cold. They are meant for the freezer, right?
customer_reviews.author: Gayla

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They are okay, I thought I was buying the kind of mugs that would not get all wet on the outside of the glass... wrong
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift for Friend
customer_reviews.text: I did not open this package. It was ordered for a friend for Christmas. He said he is pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: MsDiz

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome cups
customer_reviews.text: These cups are made well and stay cold for a very long time. Love them and they came super fast. Great seller
customer_reviews.author: Teri Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these mugs
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these mugs. I now realize that the cheapo seasonal ones I have been using are vastly inferior. My old ones just had some kind of liquid in them that didn't stay cold very long, and at first I was disconcerted by the crushed-ice look of the gel. These freeze amazingly fast and keep my drink cold long after I have drained it. As a diet coke junkie that likes my drinks very cold, I would heartily recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping liquids Cold. I keep them in/on the freezer door. They work Great! I think they”ll be my go to Christmas Gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Montgomery Jr

customer_reviews.title: Cups crack
customer_reviews.text: They do keep contants cold however after a few uses, I have two of the four cups forming major cracks and are now unusable. I have stored the cups upside down per instructions but to no avail. Just tossed two cups in the garbage. Too expensive for the short usage. Too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Mataya

customer_reviews.title: <16 oz.
customer_reviews.text: They are nice and nice looking. They don't hold 16 ounces. A 16 oz. Miller Lite would overflow it, it holds a 12 fine. I bought the 22 oz version (which aren't as nice or nice looking) to hold the 16 oz miller. Apparently they oversell the size on all of these. These are better made than the bigger ones, which have cracked on me.
customer_reviews.author: Katta Bin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Gel Freezer Mug Snobs Like Me
customer_reviews.text: I am a gel freezer mug snob-- I drink everything cold in one of these. I needed to replace ones at home and at my daughters' homes just because they were getting chipped and old. These are beautiful, solid, and sturdy and work perfectly. I will treat them gently, no dishwasher! They will last a long time. The colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for beer drinkers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for beer drinkers! I love it! I've had these type of mugs before, but these ones are much prettier; also, I now know, there is no way you can put it in the dishwasher...don't even try. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Kimbas Mom

customer_reviews.title: leak
customer_reviews.text: good mugs, just don't drop them from any hight i droped one from about 18inchs high and it cracked and leaked, also if you leave them in the frezer too long they will crack, and leak inside, and outside the mug. the solid color ones are much better, but not available
customer_reviews.author: Wayne E Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses..
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses & think this is my 3rd order on them..if ya like your drinks cold & not watered down from the ice in the glasses, then these are the ones for you..I just love um..
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your drink refreshingly cold!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Read reviews about handles breaking off, but we have not had an issue. Drinks stay cold. We hand wash and refreeze.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: great glasses
customer_reviews.text: We have arthritis in our hands. These glasses are so easy to hold, and are attractive too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Moody

customer_reviews.title: These gel mugs are great to keep liquids cold
customer_reviews.text: I really like these gel mugs. I keep them in the freezer so they are ready to use at all times. They keep your drink chilled and even icey for quite a while. The colors are vivid and the mugs are quite durable (haven't chipped or damaged them so far). They are a great addition to my household.
customer_reviews.author: cyndy holm

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Mugs Ever
customer_reviews.text: These are not the old freezer mugs from 30 years ago. These are the best mugs I have ever seen. I usually have to put lots and lots of ice in a drink to get it cold enough. But with these, no ice and if u are a drink sipper, you’ll have ice crystals forming on your drink before your finished. Look no further, these are the mugs for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks super cold!
customer_reviews.text: Great mugs for any occasion. Sturdy , pretty, and efficient. Keeps drinks super cold almost sluggish for a lot longer than it takes to drink them!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kegerator
customer_reviews.text: The handles will eventually break off but the glasses will still be fine.
customer_reviews.author: William M

customer_reviews.title: Mugs started leaking gel after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Of the 4 mugs purchased, 2 of them started leaking gel after 30 days. I attempted to contact the seller to have 2 replacement mugs sent, but I missed the 30-day warranty window by a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fleischman

customer_reviews.title: Buy these for the coldest icey delight drinks!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different types of these mugs, some which broke easiest after freezing. So far these mugs seem sturdier than those I previously purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Koltko

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the freezer mugs, but one came broken and now They are starting to crack. Use them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold!
customer_reviews.text: These are a good deal. They keep drinks really cold!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Takes "Ice Cold" up to a whole other level!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps not just one beer cold (depending on how fast you drink), but up to three of them icy cold. As someone who insists on drinking from a very cold mug, this one is the perfect answer. These are great mugs, very well made, and they truly keep your drink icy cold for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Fleetsubmariner

customer_reviews.title: One Broken Cup
customer_reviews.text: One of the cups cracked right down the side within the first couple weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Silverhamr

customer_reviews.title: Fun poolside mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these for drinking cold beverages poolside, just be sure to turn them upside down for freezer storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jean C. Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Frosty and slushy awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I love having a frosty cold drink! These mugs are great!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Store in freezer UPSIDE DOWN!
customer_reviews.text: Best insulated mugs on the market. Will turn a coke into a slush! Great for a good beer.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The only recommendation I would make to the product is a "Self-Refillable Option". This would save steps the cooler or Refrigerator Imagine, a mug that is never empty - A dream comes true.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drink cold for long time
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting cups that will stand up and keep drink cold for long period of time & these are it. I keep them in the freezer at all times upside down and always hand wash them. These cups are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glass cracked.
customer_reviews.text: Love the mugs, but one has cracked already. Only hand washed, stored upside down in freezer. Took out mug and it was cracked down the whole side. Very disappointed and hope the others don’t crack.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K

customer_reviews.title: One cracked
customer_reviews.text: One cracked in half. Now I have 3 and I can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: christian miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these. Second time I ordered. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: patp

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up throwing all of them away. Handle 's kept falling off at any given time.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Dunn

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: Keeps drinks cold enough to create ice in the glass.
customer_reviews.author: John Y.

customer_reviews.title: Handles fall off!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in February 2019 and tossed the last one out August 2019. I even glued the handles with gorilla glue twice! They work great if you don’t want handles. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bye

customer_reviews.title: Handles broke off (just like everyone says)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four of these cups a little less than one year ago. The handles have broken off of two of them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bahner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long...
customer_reviews.text: Big enough but don't actually stay or keep drinks cold very long and the bottom has already cracked off of or them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Turn upside down.
customer_reviews.text: One split open first time l froze them. Probably my fault didn't turn them upside down.
customer_reviews.author: stan boyd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mugs. Heavy duty. Stays cold for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ronalda

customer_reviews.title: Ice cold drinks
customer_reviews.text: They are great and cool the drinks just as advertised. Prompt delivery and service
customer_reviews.author: Bellvike

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 4 glasses have already cracked in freezer
customer_reviews.author: Cathy P.

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: they were nice the first few times. them they started to melt to fast and water drips down the cup..
customer_reviews.author: Scord5

customer_reviews.title: I love the cups they are amazing and will get room ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the cups they are amazing and will get room temp drinks cold and crisp fast. Only problem is its been a week or so and one cup has already cracked so that really sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I like 'em
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. It even deposits little ice crystals in your beverage! I just keep mine in the freezer. I have not had them that long and if they hold up over the long haul I will be very pleased. They are nice and heavy and sturdy.o
customer_reviews.author: Joan D.

customer_reviews.title: Love em. Thank
customer_reviews.text: When cold just isn't cold enough. Love em. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my friends and I think these are the best.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 sets of these. my friends and I think these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: They are excellent. Always remember to put them in the freezer ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want ice cold drinks, these are the mugs to get. They are excellent. Always remember to put them in the freezer upside down. They chill faster and stay cold longer.
customer_reviews.author: david ducey

customer_reviews.title: they are fine but they do leak around the colored rim
customer_reviews.text: they are fine but they do leak around the colored rim. take that off and make it smooth and they would be better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The mug are pretty and keep your drink cold
customer_reviews.text: The mug are pretty and keep your drink cold, so cold something you will have fine ice in your drink. I will purchase this product again to give as gifts
customer_reviews.author: Y tyler

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a decent beer mug!
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty, pretty nice. Not the cheap thin plastic with colored water filler, these are sturdy and have those fancy gel crystals. *Update* They are still holding up fine and get a good amount of use. Update: Used for almost two years and zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sprov

customer_reviews.title: Too Small and Too Wet
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time with these mugs. They drip water like crazy and don't hold very much. I total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Groovy Gammy

customer_reviews.title: Good but one of mine cracked
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased to get these for my son and they were great at keeping beer cold. However one literally cracked all the way thru and have no idea why. I’ve hand washed and placed upside down in freezer as recommended and tonight when I took out the red mug one entire side cracked all the way thru. Sad cuz it was great having the four now down to three. Hope the remaining ones don’t crack.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: 1st time was the charm. 3rd time not so much
customer_reviews.text: We've bought these cups 3 times over the years. The first set lasted a long time. The second set a very short time. I thiught maybe there was something wrong so I ordered a 3rd set. These are a let down too. The red one did the same thing the green one did and the orange one the handle broke off. Not buying another set again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: does it's job, great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a nice mug that would keep my drinks cool, it does it's job and use it once or twice a week, just now, a little over a year after ordering have I finally managed to crack one from the constant cooling from room temp. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love these mugs!!!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for root beer floats and they are awesome. Keeps root beer cold like a slushie. Easy to clean and stores great in freezer. I place them upside down as directed and it works exactly as described. Will be ordering more for the summer. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so on keeping beer cold
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would really help to get the beer super cold but nope. I put one in the freezer for 24 hours and poured a really cold one in. It seemed to not help much with getting the beer any colder. what ever effect it had on the beer didn't last long at all. Inside 10 minutes the walls were just so so cold. I have had thick glass mugs that do a much better job. personally I suggest passing on these.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Cant place in freezer at temps.14° or less
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PLACE IN FREEZER AT 14° OR BELOW. My freezer does not go up to 14°. Have a new fridge, digitally tried no way. These are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these mugs!! They keep liquids cold for quite some time. In fact, you can reuse them for at least an hour before placing them back in the freezer. Best part, they don’t sweat, no coasters needed
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I wish you could put them in the dishwasher, but I have been washing by hand and they have been working great. My husband uses multiple mugs daily!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: These cups are pretty and sturdy. I feel they make drinks more refreshing and fun. They are nice to have when I dont have icecubes.
customer_reviews.author: GRANDMA Y

customer_reviews.title: Colorful bases
customer_reviews.text: The colorful bases make it a cinch to find my glass in the crowd. The instructions were easy to follow. Be sure the glasses go into the freezer upside down. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: clarkann

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mugs
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses them to turn her soda into icees. They make great icees.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: The freezer mugs are wonderful. One on the handles fell off of one ...
customer_reviews.text: The freezer mugs are wonderful. One on the handles fell off of one the mugs. They are not very old. I am disappointed that this happened. Now, I am waiting to see if the other handles will also fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Susie F

customer_reviews.title: Chilling experience
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTE quality product. Seem to chill my beverage even better than previous purchase. Chills the beverage so well the liquid actually gets a little slushy. LOVE the colors. They are clean and vibrant and actually part of the acrylic rather than being applied. Will "bookmark" these for future reference should I want more.
customer_reviews.author: eandrews53

customer_reviews.title: Beer and milk?  Really!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended these cups. They are great for beer and even better for ice cold milk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs
customer_reviews.text: Freeze quickly and keep everything frosty. Perfect for taking outside

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I use these steins everyday, because they are easy to use and wash.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for summer, hand wash only
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well and arrived on time. Disappointed a little because the bottoms become lose from mug and need glued after a few uses and hand washing.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Drinks Cold But Over Time, They Crack and Lose Their Handles
customer_reviews.text: The plus is that they keep your drinks cold for a long period of time. I love my drinks cold and this does the job quite well (even though it ices inside from time to time). The big negatives is that they crack and lose their handles over time. I'll keep buying until I find a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Lemur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for anything cold! I like to mix up some chocolate milk and then freeze it in this mug for a cool dessert. So far they are holding up well. I had some cheaper ones I bought at a party store and they ended up cracking and handles broke off. Do not put them in the dishwasher which it states in the info booklet. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: I love them so much
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a few sets of these mugs. The key is to always wash them by hand and let them dry before putting them in the freezer. They will last much longer that way. I love them so much, I have purchased sets for my daughter twice! I love them.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyMomma

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Not only died ir work to cool off your drink, but when left in the freezer a bit longer, my sods actually got some slush. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer!

customer_reviews.title: Handy mugs
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are just perfect, hold one 12 oz can and keep the beverage cold for quite awhile. I had some bigger ones and they were too awkward. The quality and appearance are nice as well. Thanks!!

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy save your money
customer_reviews.text: The worst. They split open in just a few months.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work really well and stay frozen long enough to have several beverages

customer_reviews.text: These are too big! OK for beer mug I guess.

customer_reviews.text: Almost too good, can freeze beverage to side so not 100% is available until it thaws some.

customer_reviews.title: so I had to order another set because I loved them so much
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set that I bought! The first set I bought back in 2013, two of them cracked, so I had to order another set because I loved them so much. They stay cold for a long time. (2hrs)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Klim

customer_reviews.title: These are great mugs and they do keep your beverage cold
customer_reviews.text: These are great mugs and they do keep your beverage cold! Time will tell as to how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. Very thick and sturdy. Freeze quickly. Love the four different colors so everyone knows whos is whos.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany V Dolby

customer_reviews.title: Love these mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs! They keep beverages cold a long time and have not leaked or cracked. I do not put them in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Love this mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love my mugs. I never use ice cubes any more.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps drinks cold, I don't get as much frothy goodness as I would have expected.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Best way to have some cold suds.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friend. He hadn't seen these before, and now uses them whenever he has a cold beverage. I have a set of another brand, not nearly as nice as these. They are the best for a cold brew in the summer. The ice lasts longer than the beer inside.
customer_reviews.author: GaryC

product_meta.title: Lily's Home Double Wall Gel-Filled Acrylic Freezer Stein Mugs, Great as Old Fashion Drinking Glasses at BBQs and Parties, Clear with Assorted Color Accents (16 oz. Each, Set of 4)
feature_bullets: KEEP YOUR DRINKS COLD AND REFRESHING: Each of the 4 mugs is constructed with double-walled insulation filled with crackle gel that can go in the freezer and keep your drink extra cold while you enjoy it!
FROSTY AND ENJOYABLE: The unique gel creates a frosty appearance between your beverage and the mug. A set includes one each: blue, red, orange, and green so everyone has their own color.

FREEZE AND REFREEZE: Hand wash and refreeze for four hours so you always have frosty mugs. Mugs hold up to 16 ounces of liquid and made of a BPA-free acrylic material, so they are safe to use for just about any beverage. Pour your favorite beer in one of these and enjoy! They are also perfect for root beer floats, iced coffee, or even just plain water.

CHILL DRINKS WITHOUT WATERING THEM DOWN: Serve any beverage in these freezable mugs for an instant ice-cold chill. You don't have to worry about traditional ice cubes melting and watering down your drink before you finish it. Yuck! The freezer gel is safely between the double walls of the mug, so it never touches your drink, yet still keeps it cold.

A GREAT GIFT IDEA: Lily's Home makes a wide array of products for every home and garden lover. Whether you're looking for a perfect gift to spruce up your friend's garden, or if you need a housewarming present, Lily's Home has something for everyone!
